So i put my claim in and a day later the robot says ‚Äúafter carefully checking‚Äù the refund was processed‚Ä¶ The refund is nowhere to be found so I replied that I checked again and nothing. I also asked if they possibly added the money to the wrong card. Again the robot says the refund was processed. I called my bank because don‚Äôt play with my money.
